dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement / Cease & Desist]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Sunday, March 26, 2006 8:03 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; ron@ronwainscottphotography.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement / Cease & Desist]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement / Cease & Desist
Date:         Sat, 25 Mar 2006 14:02:13 -0600
From:         Ron Wainscott Photography <ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
To:         <copyright@theplanet.com>
CC:         info@theplanet.com, support@theplanet.com,
legal-response@theplanet.com, webmaster@celebswap.com, abuse@theplanet.com



It is my understanding that http://celebswap.com is hosted by The Planet.
If http://celebswap.com is NOT hosted by your company, I apologize for
contacting the wrong company.

Your customer is illegally hosting copyrighted material owned by me.
Not only is your customer hosting these images on his forum, he is charging
a fee for access to material that he DOES NOT own.  Your customer does not
have permission to host my work on your servers.
Therefore, I am demanding immediate removal of this copyrighted material.
Refusal to remove these images / videos will result in legal action against
your customer AND THE PLANET under the DMCA Act, which will be filed on
Monday March 27, 2006 if the images are not removed.

The content being hosted on your server was illegally downloaded from
http://www.dawnavril.com and http://www.kissmejamie.com.  All material
contained on dawnavril.com and kissmejamie.com is owned by me and is not to
be used or published without the express written consent of Ron Wainscott
Photography and Avatar Media Group.

The infringing material is located at:

http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110590
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110589
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110587
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110586
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110580
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110576
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110551
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110542
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110538
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110536
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110535
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=109833
http://celebswap.com/pics/index.php?showtopic=110548


I am the rightful owner of the images and videos listed above, which are
illegally being hosted on your servers.  You may contact me at:
Ron Wainscott Photography
P.O. Box 4766
Gulf Shores, AL 36547
(251) 967-4226
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com <mailto:ron@ronwainscottphotography.com>
**
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its
agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification
is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

If any further material from dawnavril.com is found on your servers, legal
action will be taken immediately without notice.  It would be in your best
interest to check all of your servers to make sure that there is no more of
my content being illegally hosted by your company.  You have been warned
several times in the past to stop stealing my content.
You have chosen to continue allowing my material to be illegally hosted on
your servers.  So consider this your FINAL warning.  Any further copyright
infringement by your company will be dealt with by the authorities.

Ron Wainscott
(251) 967-4226
ron@ronwainscottphotography.com

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFEJ0fJvK/XpJs6oyURAmjWAJ94Ms7XJUKU6qGUIRzpfwa5zz12SQCfbtHr

=Q8bc
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
